Data Preparation

Visualisation

```{r = diagram1, echo=FALSE}

#Here is my data visualisation project for the module PSY6422. 

library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)

data1 <- read_excel("~/myfinalproject/processed/data1.xlsx")
View(data1)

d1<- ggplot(data1, aes(x = factor(years), y = number, fill = country, 
                       group = country)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point(size = 2, shape = 21) +
  labs(y="Years", x = "Number of People") +
  labs(title = "Number of Rough Sleepers in Greater London by Nationality")

d1

ggsave("figures/d1.png")

```
